name: "Screwed the Pooch" Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where are the Griffins before the opening credits?
questions.explanation:
The zoo.

	Stewie is mauled by animals at a petting zoo and Peter severely hurts a kangaroo by going into its pouch.

questions.text: What class does Peter take at the adult education center?
questions.explanation:
French.

	Peter tries to act more like his father-in-law before he and Lois have to visit her parents, so he tries to act like a rich snob.

questions.text: What reality TV show was Peter once on?
questions.explanation:
Survivor.

	Peter accidentally knocks down the walls of the set of "Survivor", and we can see the set of the "Price is Right" in the background.

questions.text: What card game is Peter a professional at?
questions.explanation:
Poker.

	Mr. Peuderschmidt decides to let Peter play poker with him and a couple of his rich friends even though he hates Peter.

questions.text: Who does not play the card game with Peter and his father-in-law?
questions.explanation:
Bill Clinton.

	Soon, the high-powered businessmen are trading off CNN and other huge companies in their game.

questions.text: What is the name of Mr. Peuderschmidt's dog?
questions.explanation:
Seabreeze & Sea Breeze.

	Seabreeze is an award winning dog and Brian can't help but feel attracted to her.  He runs onto a dog racetrack to get her.

questions.text: Where does Brian hide with Mr. Peuderschmidt's dog?
questions.explanation:
A motel.

	Inside their motel bathroom are a pair of giant, bad roaches who threaten to cut Brian and Seabreeze up.  The room is dingy and small.

questions.text: Who does Tom Tucker pretend his evil twin is?
questions.explanation:
Todd Tucker.

	Tom Tucker creates this alter-ego to make sure that his job isn't ruined when he's discovered in a motel with a prostitute.

questions.text: What is Chris' favourite ice cream flavour?
questions.explanation:
Chocolate chip.

	This is one of the facts we are provided with during the trial where Brian sue Mr. Peuderschmidt.  We also learn that Meg's real father is named Stan Thompson.  Meg doesn't hear the fact because she's listening to a Walkman.

No.

	It turns out that Seabreeze wasn't carrying Brian's puppies, but instead, she was carrying Ted Turner's puppies.
